projects.title: Braille Printer
projects.subtitle: Hackwestern 3 | 2016
info: Low cost braille printer that takes text or images as input and prints out the braille onto sheets of paper
Built with: raspberry pi B+, Python, transistors, diodes and solenoids/servo motor.

projects.title: Depository Repository
projects.subtitle: Hackwestern 5 | 2018
info: Depository Repository is an Airbnb style app that allows users to rent storage space from each other.
3 separate components: a phone app, its backend, and its security camera. The security camera ran on the
Built with: DragonBoard 410c, Python, Stdlib, Algolia, and Google Cloud.

projects.title: Tap ATM
projects.subtitle: RUHakcs | May 2018
info: Tap ATM allows you to access your bank accounts and enter all of your transaction details on a phone app, then withdraw/deposit your money from the ATM by tapping your phone to the machine's receiver.
The app was created using Kotlin, the backend was created using python and flask

projects.title: Green Waste Bin
projects.subtitle: QHacks 2017 | February 2017
info: The Green Waste Bin is a device bin that can categorize waste as garbage, plastics, or paper.
Uses ML and image recognition to classify garbage. The stepper motors then drop the garbage in the right spot.
Built with: Lego, stepper motors, raspberry pi, webcam, python, AWS, HTML, JS

projects.title: The Voice of Reason
projects.subtitle: DeltaHacks 3 | January 2017
info: An android based voice controlled budgeting system.
Kept track of budgets for different categories, and allowed users to quickly retrieve budget information using voice commands
Feedback about spending habits was provided
Built using Java and Google's voice recognition API

projects.title: Theia
projects.subtitle: ConUHacks II | January 2017
info: A tool for the visually impaired that describes the world around them.
Uses a combination of image recognition libraries to describe a scene out loud
Built using Clarifai, icrosoft Cognitive Service's Computer Vision, Azure storage, python

projects.title: MyPaint
projects.subtitle: Personal Project
info: A Paint application that handles different shapes, freeform and colours
Can group shapes together or undo/redo actions
